name: CovidVacSim
description:
Protect three blood vessels from waves of viruses!

Covid Vac Sim is an unconventional tower defense game. The player plays as a nano-bot and defends organs against the invading virus. 

The goal is to protect three blood vessels from viruses. The heart above each vessel indicates the remaining HP. The player can deploy turrets to defeat the virus. 

Beware: turrets need to be recycled after their energy runs out. And virus could take away the towers! 'Found' the 'lost' turrets taken by the virus! 

Controls: 

  • WASD: move 
  • Hold E: deploy turret 
  • Q: recycle turret 
  • Mouse Wheel: switch turret type 
  • R + click on the ground: call towers within range to volley on the selected position
  • Z: show virus indicators

This game is created for Global Game Jam 2021

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/covid-vac-sim-5
